results.description: Last week's Travel View revealed that many readers want to take their children out of school during term time because holidays cost so much less. Will the introduction of £100 fines stop them? Can the travel industry really justify doubling prices in school holidays and will a new pattern school year send prices up or down? We canvassed the views of headteachers, parents and travel companies.
results.title: Should you pay up for going absent without leave?

attachments.caption: Emma Mahony with her daughter in Morocco
